content:
As an AI language model, I can provide you with some suggestions based on the popularity and critical acclaim of video game soundtracks. Here are a few recommendations for video game soundtracks to purchase on vinyl or CD:

1. The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild (Vinyl)
2. Final Fantasy VII Remake (Vinyl)
3. Journey (Vinyl)
4. NieR: Automata (Vinyl)
5. Bloodborne (Vinyl)
6. Cuphead (Vinyl)
7. Silent Hill 2 (CD)
8. Chrono Trigger (Vinyl or CD)
9. Persona 5 (Vinyl)
10. Resident Evil 2 (Vinyl)

These soundtracks are diverse in genres and styles, so depending on the kind of music you enjoy, you may find one or more of these albums to your liking.
